709160.name: Smart Junior Academy - Autumn
709160.description:
Learn Through Play, That's the Way!

Welcome to the Smart Junior Academy - Autumn


Caution! The purchase of the game is possible only until February 28, 2021. After this date, we will stop selling our games on the Steam platform.

Entertaining educational game for children (5-9 years).

Designed in cooperation with child psychology academics, in order to support development of memory, concentration and mathematical skills, as well as to extend common knowledge.

One of four parts in Smart Junior Academy series.The Autumn part contains 20 varied exercises with 10 difficulty levels and also printable extras: colouring activities and worksheets.

Great emphasis is placed on conveying information about natural environment in a fascinating way, with beautiful autumn theme with warm colors.


Printable extras: colouring activities, worksheets.

Great emphasis is placed on conveying information about natural environment in a fascinating way.
